items.desc: Homemade chili topped with shredded, lettuce, diced tomato, monterey jack cheese, jalapenos over tortillas with salsa, sour cream.
Fried golden brown with honey mustard sauce, with french fries.
Fried golden brown with marinara sauce.
A southern recipe, served with ranch dressing and celery sticks.
Topped with brown gravy & melted mozzarella cheese.
